affirmations: You are the best thing to ever happen to me... after beef steak and pizza

You’re built different (in a good way)
You’re the reason my screen time is high
Better watch all the reels I send you, else I'll hack your account and watch them from your account
You make mid days less mid
You’re not annoying, sometimes but it's cute
You’re proof that good things exist
You’re cute without trying and it’s unfair
You’re not lucky, you’re just that good
You’re the reason I smile at my phone
You’re built like a soft reset
You’re the highlight of my day
You don’t even try and still win
You’re the best part of my routine
You’re the good kind of addictive
You’re my favorite place to be in ;) p.s forgive me
You’re doing better than you think
You’re not behind, you’re on your path
You’re exactly what you need to be

You’re the best part of my day, consistently
